title: Lulu's chicken stock
ingredients: ['1 chicken carcass, including skin', '1 large Spanish onion, halved', '2 large carrots, peeled and halved', '2 celery sticks, halved', '1 large garlic clove, peeled but left whole', '1 bay leaf', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'sea salt and black pepper to taste']
